mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NQ ( NQ_NO, AD_ID, NQ_TITLE, NQ_CONTENT, NQ_CATEGORY, NQ_FILE, NQ_DATE ) VALUES( SEQ_NQ_nq_no.nextval, 'ADMIN', #{nq_title}, #{nq_content}, #{nq_category}, #{nq_file}, sysdate)
